architectural_decisions.title: Use of Microservices Architecture
architectural_decisions.rationale: To ensure scalability, maintainability, and security.

architectural_decisions.title: FastAPI for Building REST API
architectural_decisions.rationale: FastAPI provides high performance, easy-to-use routing, and built-in support for data validation with Pydantic.

architectural_decisions.title: Pydantic for Data Validation
architectural_decisions.rationale: Pydantic simplifies data validation and provides type hints for better code readability.

architectural_decisions.title: Repository Pattern for Data Access Layer
architectural_decisions.rationale: Abstracts the data access layer, providing methods for CRUD operations and improving testability.

architectural_decisions.title: Dependency Injection for Dependency Management
architectural_decisions.rationale: FastAPI's dependency injection helps manage dependencies like the current user and payment processor.

architectural_decisions.title: Custom Exceptions with FastAPI's HTTPException
architectural_decisions.rationale: HTTPException allows defining custom error handlers for various error scenarios.

architectural_decisions.title: Payment Processing with Multiple Providers Support
architectural_decisions.rationale: Supporting Stripe, PayPal, and Square enables flexibility in payment options.

architectural_decisions.title: JWT Tokens for Authentication
architectural_decisions.rationale: JSON Web Tokens provide secure authentication for accessing protected resources.

architectural_decisions.title: Authorization Enforcement at Endpoints
architectural_decisions.rationale: Enforcing authorization at specific endpoints ensures data privacy and security.

architectural_decisions.title: ORM for Database Interactions
architectural_decisions.rationale: Using an Object-Relational Mapping improves code readability and reduces boilerplate code.

architectural_decisions.title: Confirmation Emails via send_order_confirmation Function
architectural_decisions.rationale: Automated notifications improve user experience by confirming order creation.
